title: Gray ''play'' button
body: I'm playing with League of legends V7.16. Since today my ''play'' button is gray and says; We aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please exit the client and re-open it to try again.'' I've done this several times but it stays gray and it keeps telling me the same thing. I've restarted my computer and re-installed the game. Does anyone know how to fix this problem?

replies.body: The Eu team is aware of this issue, please look at this thread: https://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/EfzevHEj-intermittent-play-button-issues

This can happen if your connection is having issues reaching the matchmaking service.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot and clear up any blocks.  Let me know if that helps.
